long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickDefine:

QuickDefine is your ultimate Chrome extension for lightning-fast word definitions, meanings, and synonyms, all at the click of a button. Whether you're a student, writer, or language enthusiast, QuickDefine elevates your browsing experience by providing instant access to a wealth of linguistic knowledge.

Features:
1. Quick Definitions: Highlight any word on a webpage and instantly retrieve its definition without leaving your current tab.
2. Synonym Search: Explore synonyms for any word to expand your vocabulary and enhance your writing.

With QuickDefine, discover the meaning and synonyms of any word with unparalleled speed and convenience. Upgrade your browsing experience today with QuickDefine – the ultimate word companion for Chrome.
